topic.title: EMS Current Medication Section - conformance rules

ol.li: SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code/@code="67844-1" EMS Current Medications Section (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:10218)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] title = "EMS Current Medications Section" (CONF:10219)

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] entry (CONF:10220)
This entry SHALL conform to Derived Entry template (templateId: 2.16.840.1.1133883.17.3.10.1.24)
This entry SHALL contain zero or one [0..1] observation (CONF:10223)
This observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code/@code="67791-4" Currently on medication (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:10224)
This observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] value with data type BL (CONF:10225)
If EHistory.12 has the value "None Reported," the value is "False" If EHistory.12 has the value "Refused" or "Unable to Complete," the value is "NI"; the original value may be recorded in Observation.text.
Contains exactly one [1..1] On Medication Entry (templateId: 2.16.840.1.1133883.17.3.10.1.24)

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] entry (CONF:10221)
This entry SHALL conform to Derived Entry template (templateId: 2.16.840.1.1133883.17.3.10.1.24)
This entry SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] observation (CONF:10226)
This observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code/@code="69749-0" Patient on anticoagulants (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:10227)
This observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] value with data type BL (CONF:10228)
NEMSIS Trace: If EHistory.12 has the value "No anticoagulants," the value is False
Contains exactly one [1..1] On Anticoagulants Entry (templateId: 2.16.840.1.1133883.17.3.10.1.24)

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] entry (CONF:10222)
This entry SHALL conform to Derived Entry template (templateId: 2.16.840.1.1133883.17.3.10.1.24)
This entry MAY contain zero or more [0..*] substanceAdministration (CONF:10229)
Such substanceAdministrations MAY contain zero or one [0..1] @negationInd (CONF:10233)
If EHistory.12 has the value "None Reported," the value is "True" This negation of a notional class is parallel to the explicit question "patient on medication"
Such substanceAdministrations MAY contain zero or one [0..1] @nullFlavor (CONF:10234)
If EHistory.12 has the value "Refused" or "Unable to Complete," the value is "NI"; the original value may be recorded in SubstanceAdministration.text. This nulled notional class is parallel to the explicit question "patient on medication"
Such substanceAdministrations SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] doseQuantity (CONF:10230)
NEMSIS Trace: EHistory.13, EHistory.14
Such substanceAdministrations SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] routeCode (CONF:10232), where the @code SHALL be selected from ValueSet STATIC (CONF:10231)
NEMSIS Trace: EMedication.15
Such substanceAdministrations SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] consumable (CONF:10235)
This consumable SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] manufacturedProduct (CONF:10236)
This manufacturedProduct SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] manufacturedLabeledDrug (CONF:10237)
This manufacturedLabeledDrug SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:10239), where the @code SHALL be selected from (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.88 RxNorm) (CONF:10238)
NEMSIS Trace: EHistory.12
Contains exactly one [1..1] Current Medication Entry (templateId: 2.16.840.1.1133883.17.3.10.1.24)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code/@code="67844-1" EMS Current Medications Section (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:10218)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] title = "EMS Current Medications Section" (CONF:10219)

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] entry (CONF:10220)
This entry SHALL conform to Derived Entry template (templateId: 2.16.840.1.1133883.17.3.10.1.24)
This entry SHALL contain zero or one [0..1] observation (CONF:10223)
This observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code/@code="67791-4" Currently on medication (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:10224)
This observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] value with data type BL (CONF:10225)
If EHistory.12 has the value "None Reported," the value is "False" If EHistory.12 has the value "Refused" or "Unable to Complete," the value is "NI"; the original value may be recorded in Observation.text.
Contains exactly one [1..1] On Medication Entry (templateId: 2.16.840.1.1133883.17.3.10.1.24)

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] entry (CONF:10221)
This entry SHALL conform to Derived Entry template (templateId: 2.16.840.1.1133883.17.3.10.1.24)
This entry SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] observation (CONF:10226)
This observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code/@code="69749-0" Patient on anticoagulants (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:10227)
This observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] value with data type BL (CONF:10228)
NEMSIS Trace: If EHistory.12 has the value "No anticoagulants," the value is False
Contains exactly one [1..1] On Anticoagulants Entry (templateId: 2.16.840.1.1133883.17.3.10.1.24)

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] entry (CONF:10222)
This entry SHALL conform to Derived Entry template (templateId: 2.16.840.1.1133883.17.3.10.1.24)
This entry MAY contain zero or more [0..*] substanceAdministration (CONF:10229)
Such substanceAdministrations MAY contain zero or one [0..1] @negationInd (CONF:10233)
If EHistory.12 has the value "None Reported," the value is "True" This negation of a notional class is parallel to the explicit question "patient on medication"
Such substanceAdministrations MAY contain zero or one [0..1] @nullFlavor (CONF:10234)
If EHistory.12 has the value "Refused" or "Unable to Complete," the value is "NI"; the original value may be recorded in SubstanceAdministration.text. This nulled notional class is parallel to the explicit question "patient on medication"
Such substanceAdministrations SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] doseQuantity (CONF:10230)
NEMSIS Trace: EHistory.13, EHistory.14
Such substanceAdministrations SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] routeCode (CONF:10232), where the @code SHALL be selected from ValueSet STATIC (CONF:10231)
NEMSIS Trace: EMedication.15
Such substanceAdministrations SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] consumable (CONF:10235)
This consumable SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] manufacturedProduct (CONF:10236)
This manufacturedProduct SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] manufacturedLabeledDrug (CONF:10237)
This manufacturedLabeledDrug SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:10239), where the @code SHALL be selected from (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.88 RxNorm) (CONF:10238)
NEMSIS Trace: EHistory.12
Contains exactly one [1..1] Current Medication Entry (templateId: 2.16.840.1.1133883.17.3.10.1.24)

body.codeblock: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <section xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns="urn:hl7-org:v3" xsi:schemaLocation="urn:hl7-org:v3 CDA.xsd"> <id root="584371865" extension="MDHT"/> <code code="67844-1" codeSystem="2.16.840.1.113883.6.1" codeSystemName="LOINC" displayName="EMS Current Medications"/> <title>TEXT FOR TITLE</title> <text/> <entry> <observation> <code code="355529280"/> <value xsi:type="BL"/> </observation> </entry> <entry> <observation> <code code="1347518272"/> <value xsi:type="BL"/> </observation> </entry> <entry> <substanceAdministration> <routeCode code="1263058590"/> <doseQuantity/> <consumable/> </substanceAdministration> </entry> </section>
